content: to 76___ _ 64 to 68___56 to 60 child 112 to 116__ _ 92 to 94_ __80 to 84___ _72 to 76___ 64 to 68 small 116 to 120 96 to 100 86 to 90 80 to 84 72 to 76 med 124 to 128 104 to 108 94 to 98 86 to 90 78 to 80 lg 132 to 136 112 to 120 100 to 104 92 to 96 84 to 88 fyi counting the ear flap stitches c/o amounts for this pattern are 64 70 77 80 84 there s a size here for everyone please note infants & children s head sizes can vary a great deal & do not conform to industry standards the best way to determine what size to make for them will be to measure the head you are knitting for & match up to your gauge this works for adult size heads too last up-dated 2009 compiled by anne carroll gilmour for hat knitting classes
